item.description:
Seasoned television and multimedia writer, producer and director, Michael O'Keefe, DreamFrames Multimedia, will present an overview on creating and managing video and multimedia projects and the concepts of convergence (the culmination of media platforms). Michael's work and knowledge will provide us with in-depth and up-to-date information of this fast-growing trend. This program will cover broad industry updates and is suitable for creatives of any discipline.

TO RESERVE YOUR PLACE:  
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-Oct 28 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the  PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Chicken Picatta; Potato Crusted Sole; White Pasta with Garlic & Oil (vegetarian).

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Thursday, October 23rd. You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on Oct 23rd, so that we can cancel your reservation.

We're looking forward to seeing you there!

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Next ICC meeting, Tues, Oct 28: All About Video and Multimedia Production
